method.name: DELETE
method.doc: A two-stage commit process is used when making configuration changes on the appliance.
Stage 1: Changes are made and are saved to a staging area.
Stage 2: The user explicitly deploys the changes into production.

To roll back all changes currently in a pending state, issue an HTTP DELETE command on the Verify Access pending changes resource URI. Multiple changes may exist in a pending state at the same time. They are rolled back together when a user rolls back the changes.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service
